phase1_summary: Domain: beverage_preparation; Capability: Coffee Preparation; Use Case: Prepare Espresso; Actors: User (human), Brew Timer (non_human); Excluded: Manual coffee preparation, Bean sourcing and purchasing...
phase2_summary: Analyzed 4 resources from preconditions; Created 4 Manager Controllers; Identified 4 Boundary Objects; Found 6 context-based transformations; Domain: beverage_preparation
